cast.overview: A teenage girl living with schizophrenia begins to suspect her neighbor has kidnapped a child. Her parents try desperately to help her live a normal life, without exposing their own tragic secrets, and the only person who believes her is Caleb – a boy she isn’t even sure exists.
cast.title: Fear of Rain

details.biography:
After studying acting at NYU and Stagedoor Manor,

21-year-old Actress, Writer, & Director, Ashley Abrams launched onto the scene with her intoxicating and abnormal flair. Making her music video directorial debut with "over" by Andi. (500k views).

Ashley Abrams also co-starred in the 2020 thriller, FEAR OF RAIN.

Abrams is currently in development on THE PRUDE, THE WHORE, AND THE GIRL NEXT DOOR and is set to star in VIC VISCOUS & THE FACELESS COLLECTIVE, as well as directing music videos for successful and unique voices in the LA pop-punk scene.
details.name: Ashley Abrams
